name: Tushar Tibude
title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Senior front-end engineer with 9+ years of experience in scalable architecture and modern web application development.

about.paragraph1: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 9 years of experience crafting high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, and modern frontend technologies. I‚Äôve led UI engineering efforts, designed scalable architectures, and delivered end-to-end solutions for organizations like NetApp, TrilioVault, and Capitalmind.
about.paragraph2: My core strengths lie in architecting micro-frontend systems, driving component library development, and performance best practices. I thrive in cross-functional environments, collaborate effectively with product and design teams, and take pride in building clean, maintainable, and scalable codebases. I'm deeply passionate about user-centric development, progressive enhancement, and pushing the boundaries of what frontend engineering can do.

achievements.text: Successfully developed a complete AI-integrated web application from scratch to production in just a few weeks using React 19, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and TanStack Query. Delivered highly interactive and scalable architecture.
Awarded 'Superstar' at Velotio for exceptional project contributions
Completed 'Advanced React Patterns' ‚Äì mastering hooks, context, and performance optimizations
Led architecture setup and end-to-end development of web applications using React
Earned a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering

experience.description: Worked with technologies like React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, TanStack Query, Node.js, OpenAI, Cursor AI Editor, Git, GitHub Actions, Vite, Webpack, Jest, Docker, Electron, Figma, etc
Worked with technologies like Angular 2, AngularJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, jQuery & Gulp etc

featuredProjects.title: Looking Point ‚Äì Acela Portal
featuredProjects.description: A robust enterprise IT lifecycle and asset management platform redesigned using modern frontend architecture with React 19, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Delivered dynamic JSON-driven forms, markdown-based document editor, and Electron-based desktop support.

featuredProjects.title: TrilioVault
featuredProjects.description: A cloud-native data protection platform purpose-built for Kubernetes environments, featuring multi-cluster management, real-time WebSocket communication, and intuitive user interfaces for data backup and restore workflows.

featuredProjects.title: Capitalmind
featuredProjects.description: A performance-driven mutual fund analytics platform built using Next.js and Mantine. Implemented modular component architecture, server-side rendering, and edge caching for optimal load times and SEO performance.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's discuss how we can work together!
contact.subtitle: Ready to collaborate on your next project?

extraInfo: Fluent in English, Hindi, and Marathi
Continually learning and exploring advanced frontend ecosystems
